tools.name: Dark Mode PDF Reader
tools.description: Read PDFs with inverted colors for easier reading in low light. Drag and drop or open any PDF file.

tools.name: U.S. Citizenship Test Questions
tools.description: I made this for a friend who is studying for the U.S. Citizenship Naturalization Test. They were looking for an easy, flash-card-style quiz they could practice with. Includes both 2008 (100 questions) and 2025 (128 questions) versions. Note: This is not an official resource and may contain mistakes. Please refer to USCIS.gov for the official resource.

tools.name: Textarea
tools.description: A minimalist text editor that lives entirely in your browser and stores everything in the URL hash. Originally by @antonmedv. Write-up via https://simonwillison.net/2025/Dec/27/textarea-my/. This one works best if you visit it directly at https://dviramontes.github.io/tools/textarea/.
